description:
Lou`s Balloon: Lou, a Azuki bean flavored bear Zooble is celebrating her birthday today as Em decorates the place. Chevy and her friends arrived just in time for her party. But Lou is full of mischief and sometimes causes trouble to the four Zoobles taking care of her. Later on, they started the party and give Lou balloons, but after Coron presents her Strawberry Milk cake, the Black Candies also arrived and presented to her their cake: A Chocolate Mint cake while giving her some balloons too. While they argue about which cake is much more delicious, Em notices the young Zooble is missing from her crib and everyone saw her in the sky holding the balloons. Now they need to catch her before further trouble occurs or worse.
Chevy and the Sunset Flowers: Chevy and Coron visited their friend Panky to found out about the rare phenomenon of the Sunset Flowers. Its said that the flowers blooms in the sunset once every year, seeing its a rare phenomenon that cannot be missed. The three decides to search for it, but they got no luck at all on the flower`s whereabouts. After a while, they decided to ask Kumanpa for advice. His hint helped them a bit on their search and ends up finding the flowers beneath the giant flower fields, not knowing that someone is stalking them due to the news about the flower`s rare blooming.

titles.title: Lou to Fuusen / Chevy to Yuuhi no Hana
Lou`s Balloon / Chevy and the Sunset Flowers
ルーと風船 / チェビーと夕陽の花
